comment.author: 27398485@N08
comment._content: The reindeer look so small.  Sad the hand tinting obscures so much detail, in the room - or the image was so under exposed, the tinter tried to bring out details.  Fascinating in left front corner - the teepee arrangement of wood spines...in college we learned Early American Western Eskimos and many other American Indians migrated from Siberia when there was a land bridge from what is now Siberia to continental Alaska area.  Bering Strait.
